hero.title: The SDG Wheel
hero.description: A gamified web application to raise awareness about the 17 Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs) with a special focus on climate-related themes.
hero.heroDescription: Join our community in making a positive impact on the world through engaging challenges and activities aligned with the UN Sustainable Development Goals.

projectOverview.title: Project Overview
projectOverview.description1: The SDG Wheel is a gamified web application designed to raise awareness among citizens, particularly youth, about the 17 Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs), with a special focus on climate-related themes.
projectOverview.description2: Users spin an interactive wheel representing the 17 SDGs, draw challenges or quizzes, respond, justify their actions with proof (photos/videos), accumulate points, and progress in their sustainable engagement profile.

keyFeatures.title: Key Features
keyFeatures.subtitle: Core functionalities of The SDG Wheel

sdgWheel.title: SDG Wheel
sdgWheel.description: Interactive circular wheel with 17 segments featuring SDG colors and icons. Random drawing influenced by customizable weights.

challengesQuizzes.title: Challenges & Quizzes
challengesQuizzes.description: Database of content with 2 types: multiple-choice quizzes and challenges requiring proof justification.

userProgress.title: User Progress
userProgress.description: Cumulative scores, badges per validated SDG, and progression levels: Explorer, Engaged Actor, SDG Ambassador.

userAccounts.title: User Accounts
userAccounts.description: Account creation with username/email, optional avatar and country, personal dashboard with scores and history.

monthlyPodium.title: Monthly Podium
monthlyPodium.description: Top 10 users ranking with points + proof bonuses + community votes. "Wall of Eco Heroes" section.

proofSystem.title: Proof System
proofSystem.description: Photo/video upload or external links with admin validation interface and community voting system.

climateAwareness.title: Climate Awareness
climateAwareness.description: Raise awareness about the 17 SDGs in a playful way, with special focus on climate themes (SDG 13, 7, 6, 12, 15, 2).

individualAction.title: Individual Action
individualAction.description: Encourage concrete and visible individual actions that contribute to sustainable development goals.

engagementRecognition.title: Engagement Recognition
engagementRecognition.description: Value engagement through badges, rankings, and rewards to motivate continued participation.

adaptableTool.title: Adaptable Tool
adaptableTool.description: Provide an adaptable tool for targeted campaigns and educational initiatives.

projectStatus.title: Project Status
projectStatus.message: In active development - Join us in creating positive impact!

footer.copyright: © {{year}} The SDG Wheel Project. Building a sustainable future together.

missingInfo.title: Missing Information
missingInfo.message: Please fill in all fields before sending your message.

sendFailed.message: We couldn't send your message right now. Please try again later or contact us directly.
